About
=====
Hello, I'm zhusitao, a doctoral candidate in Xu lab of Institute for Advance Studies, Wuhan 
Univerisity, China. Our Biotechnology & Interdisciplinary Research Lab is aiming to use 
interdisciplinary strategy to study ‘Translational Control’, ‘Plant Immunity’ and ‘Precision Agriculture’.
My biotechnology experience ranges from molecular separations to bioinformatics. Now I focus on 
using bioinformatic tools and deep learning algorithm to investigate the translational control.
